short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to load route optimization samples.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows users to easily upload sample route optimization problems (Multi-Vehicle Routing Problem - MVRP) for use in the NextBillion.ai Route Planner application. Simply select and upload your JSON files containing routing data to quickly integrate and test real-world logistics scenarios directly within the platform.
